amount.description: The transaction amount in the specified currency.

test.description: Flag indicating whether the transaction was done in a testing environment.

payment_details.description: Details about the payment made for the transaction.

credit_card_number.description: The masked credit card number used for payment.

credit_card_company.description: The company associated with the credit card used for payment.

user_id.description: Unique identifier of the user associated with the transaction.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the transaction took place.

remote_reference.description: Reference to an external system for the transaction.

processed_at.description: The date and time when the transaction was processed.

currency.description: The currency in which the transaction amount is stated.

id.description: Unique identifier for the tender transaction.

order_id.description: The identifier of the order associated with the transaction.

payment_method.description: The method used for payment, e.g., credit card, PayPal, etc.
